Package org.forgerock.openidm.servlet.internal

Class ServletConnectionFactory

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.servlet.internal.ServletConnectionFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.forgerock.json.resource.ConnectionFactory, RouterFilterRegistration
public class ServletConnectionFactory extends Object implements org.forgerock.json.resource.ConnectionFactory, RouterFilterRegistration
The ServletConnectionFactory responsible for providing Connections to routing requests initiated from an external request on the api servlet.
